alert.note: Alert for Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 21 at 6:13AM MDT until July 21 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High temperatures of 93 to 107 expected across the L-C Valley. * WHERE...Lewiston, Lewiston Grade, Gifford, Alpowa Summit, Peck, Lapwai, Clarkston, Pomeroy, and Culdesac. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...People acclimated to heat are also susceptable to heat related illness. Everyone should take precautions to avoid heat related illness.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
